detail_desc: Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. One pair with a print on the uppers.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Shirt in patterned viscose with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Straight-cut hem, slightly longer at the back.
Narrow, 2-part Alice band in metal decorated with rhinestones and plastic beads.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neck, flounces at the top and butterfly sleeves. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Unlined.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim with a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless sports top in jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a drawstring and collar, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, textured fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.

Pyjamas with a ribbed, long-sleeved top and patterned bottoms in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a V-neck and wrapover top for easier nursing access. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Short, fitted dress in a patterned viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft knit with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with decorative lacing.
Short, rib-knit top with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck and embroidery on the front.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with dropped shoulders with a small flounce trim.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes and a small satin bow at the front.

Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, patterned slub jersey made from organic cotton with buttons at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, pockets in the side seams and a seam at the bottom with a flared skirt.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Short dungaree dress in imitation suede with adjustable straps that fasten with press-studs and a visible zip down the front. Lined at the top.
Hat in braided paper straw with a fringe-trimmed brim. Width of brim 11 cm.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a double layer of tulle with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Scarf in soft, moss-knit cotton with a sewn-on bow at one side and contrasting colour ribbing on the short sides. Size 9x67 cm.
Coiled plastic hair elastics.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey with drawstring shoulders, cap sleeves and slits in the sides.

Dungaree shorts in cotton twill with an open chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides. Fake fly, patch front pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in jersey with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases at the front and slits in the sides.

Set in a soft, printed cotton blend. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable buttons, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top in jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side and slim legs.

Classic oversized shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Loose-fit, cotton poplin shirt with a collar, dropped shoulders, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, ribbed turtleneck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short-sleeved blouse in crêped mulberry silk with a round neck, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Rounded hem.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, fake pocket at the top, partially concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Plastic water bottle with a print motif, handle and a non-drip lid with a straw. Capacity 450 ml.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with a lightly padded front and shaped cups with ventilating mesh pockets for breast forms. Adjustable shoulder straps, padded for comfort and a wide fastening at the back with seven different positions for best fit.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Blouse in pattern-weave viscose with a sheen. Stand-up collar, bib front with button placket, a gathered yoke at the back and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. The blouse is in a straight cut with gently sloping side seams to create a gentle draping effect. Slits in the sides, longer at the back.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave. Size 50x50 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined swimsuit in patterned recycled polyester with a low-cut back and a halter neck that ties at the back of the neck and can be crossed at the front.

Cargo joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Knee-high, jacquard-knit sports socks in fast -drying functional fabric with elasticated tops.
Rib-knit hat in soft cashmere.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Knee-length dress in superstretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover front, flounce trim at the top and short flounced sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and a gently draping skirt. Unlined.
Bandeau bikini top with a silicone trim at the top and lined cups with removable inserts and side support. Detachable ties at the back of the neck and wide ties at the back.
Short satin nightslip with lace at the top, a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Satin-covered Alice band with appliqués on the top.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with buttons on the shoulders, press-studs at the crotch and short legs.
Dress in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a round neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Soft cap in UV-protective fabric with a peak at the front and flap at the back to protect both the face and back of the neck. UPF 50.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with embroidery, a small, frilled collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
V-neck jumper knitted in a blend of wool and soft, recycled cashmere. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with a frilled shaft and elasticated tops.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a diagonal zip with a chin guard and padded detail at the front and a hood with a patterned lining. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Straight-cut coat in soft faux fur containing some wool with a collar, buttons down the front and front pockets. Lined.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a regular, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt and side pockets.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with side pockets and straight, wide ankle-length legs. Wide, elasticated jersey panel at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with flared cuffs and sewn-on ties. Seam at the waist and a flare to the hem.
